title: Limited edition totes to support Superhero Daughter Day 2018!
author: WORK180
body:
Time for more women in  STEM? We think so!

DCC are fundraising to help make  Superhero Daughter Day 2018 our biggest event to date!
 

Why buy a tote?

Proceeds from each tote sold will be used to ensure girls aged 5-12 years old from all over Australia and NZ are able to participate in Superhero Daughter Day.

The totes cost $22 each, including FREE shipping!

What is Superhero Daughter Day?

Superhero Daughter Day is an event which introduces young girls to the inspiring world of science, technology, engineering and maths (STEM) through engaging activities and workshops including: 

  • Building robots
  • Exploring Virtual and Augmented Reality
  • Fashion technology and wearables
  • Learning how to design an app and much more!

The girls also have an opportunity to meet inspiring female role models, enjoy cupcakes and receive a goodie bag to take home. The event is hosted together with Tech Girls Movement and held to celebrate International Women's Day.

Check out the photos from our 2017 events, held in 9 locations across Australia and in Auckland NZ, on Facebook.

In 2017, we had over 1000 girls and their parents join in, however, there were hundreds of girls on waiting lists all around Australia. With your help, we aim to reach over 3000 girls and their parents/guardians in 2018!

Help us make Superhero Daughter Day even bigger and better in 2018! 
 

This is a limited edition of only 250 totes, so ensure you order yours today!

​
